data.name: Driving the use of public transportation with Mobility-as-a-Service
data.summary:
Join this interactive webinar to learn about:

Seamless travel for every commuter - are we nearly there?
Where are we in terms of collaborative efforts and conversations between stakeholders?
What technologies are required to make this a reality?
data.speakers:
Chris Liang, Operation Manager, International Development Department, Shenzhen Bus Group
 Kevin Orr, CEO, Liftango
 Hans Arby, CEO, Ubigo

Moderator:
 Aymeric Weyland, Co-founder, Mobility Makers
